reasoning: Hypersensitivity is a broad umbrella term encompassing multiple immunological reaction types (Type I-IV). Aggregate BOTEC estimate of major manifestations: allergic diseases (~10,000-15,000 per 100k prevalence globally considering allergies, asthma, atopic dermatitis, and other IgE-mediated conditions). Reported as prevalence since hypersensitivity is a chronic/episodic condition rather than incident event. Very heterogeneous category with significant overlap.
